```{r}
#Histograms 
mpg
mpg %>% 
  group_by(manufacturer) %>%
  summarise(n = n()) %>%
  arrange(desc(n)) %>%
  mutate(manufacturer = factor(manufacturer, unique(manufacturer))) %>%
  ggplot() +
  aes( x = manufacturer,
       y = n) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  theme_minimal()



```
